outputs.output_descr:
1. Capacity development and institutional building: Strong, well staffed, and coordinated Afghan Government, CN institutions in Kabul and at the provincial level leading an international efforts to eliminate poppy cultivation in Afghanistan 
2. Information campaign: Comprehensive and credible Ministry of Counter Narcotics lead information campaign that discourages involvement in the drug industry and effectively support all pillars of NDCS 
3. Alternative livelihood: Increase access to sustainable licit livelihood opportunities for all citizens in every province of Afghanistan 
4.Demand Reduction: The Afghan population aware and educated of the risks and danger of the drug abuse and a comprehensive and coordinated drug treatment rehabilitation aftercare and social re-integration programme established in the key provincial centers
